Reentrancy in UFragmentsPolicy.rebase() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#862-898):
	External calls:
	- exchangeRate = marketOracle.getData() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#877)
	- targetRate = xauusdOracle.latestAnswer().toUint256Safe() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#879)
	- supplyDelta = computeSupplyDelta(exchangeRate,targetRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#886)
		- uFrags.totalSupply().toInt256Safe().mul(rate.toInt256Safe().sub(targetRateSigned)).div(targetRateSigned) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#1045-1047)
	- supplyDelta > 0 && uFrags.totalSupply().add(uint256(supplyDelta)) > MAX_SUPPLY (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#891)
	- supplyDelta = (MAX_SUPPLY.sub(uFrags.totalSupply())).toInt256Safe() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#892)
	- supplyAfterRebase = uFrags.rebase(epoch,supplyDelta) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#895)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogRebase(epoch,exchangeRate,supplyDelta,now) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#897)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [UFragmentsPolicy.rebase()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L862-L898):
	External calls:
	- [exchangeRate = marketOracle.getData()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L877)
	- [targetRate = xauusdOracle.latestAnswer().toUint256Safe()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L879)
	- [supplyDelta = computeSupplyDelta(exchangeRate,targetRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L886)
		- [uFrags.totalSupply().toInt256Safe().mul(rate.toInt256Safe().sub(targetRateSigned)).div(targetRateSigned)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L1045-L1047)
	- [supplyDelta > 0 && uFrags.totalSupply().add(uint256(supplyDelta)) > MAX_SUPPLY](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L891)
	- [supplyDelta = (MAX_SUPPLY.sub(uFrags.totalSupply())).toInt256Safe()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L892)
	- [supplyAfterRebase = uFrags.rebase(epoch,supplyDelta)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L895)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [LogRebase(epoch,exchangeRate,supplyDelta,now)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UFragmentsPolicy.sol#L897)
